name: Time Bubbler
description:
A Solo Developed Game where you have to solve some puzzles using your gun that controls how fast the time passes :) Submission for the GameDev.tv Community Game Jam.

controls (Keyboard):

ASDW -> moves
Space -> Jump
Shift -> Run
E -> Activation key
Q -> WipeAll bubbles key
Left Mouse Button -> shoots if you are aiming
Right Mouse Button -> Aim 

controls (Xbox):
Left Stick-> moves
A -> Jump
Pressing the left stick -> Run
B -> Activation key
Y -> WipeAll bubbles key
Bumper-> Swap Bubble

Right Trigger -> shoots if you are aiming
Left Trigger -> Aim
